input_text:
Job Title: Construction Superintendent

Location: Eden Prairie, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Thank you for considering Steiner Construction.We are a commercial general contracting firm based in Eden Prairie, MN. Our company has been around for 75 years. We specialize in all types of commercial construction from tenant improvements to ground up construction. Our diversity in many of the market sectors has allowed us to build long standing relationships throughout the area. We strive to utilize the most advanced technology available to streamline our operations and offer the flexibility you deserve.We have an immediate need for a Construction Superintendent to grow with our company. We hope you're a personable, energetic, and fun individual with a business aptitude allowing you to manage projects, schedules, quality, and client relations.
The Role:Assist Project Management to develop an initial project schedule and communicate sequence and schedule updates to all subcontractors and vendors.Develop, maintain, and enforce a project site logistics and temporary facilities plan.Maintain and enforce a project site specific safety program in accordance with Policies and Processes, OSHA requirements, local, state, and federal laws to include all subcontractors.Maintain and enforce a project specific quality assurance and workmanship program to include all subcontractors.Participate with the Project Manager in issuance of monthly payment applications (i.e. percent complete of each activity).In coordination with the Project Manager, manage and control the budget.Perform and monitor all job site control reporting measures including daily reports, quantity reporting, accident and incident reports.Hold pre-installation meetings as required by project specifications or as neededPerform field verifications as requiredPossess working knowledge of all project plans, specifications, contract with Owner, subcontracts, purchase orders, daily correspondence, shop drawings, submittals, and all other project related documents, and maintain a complete and accurate set of as-built drawings.Coordinate and manage all material deliveries.Perform a qualitative review of all contract documents for potential conflicts or interpretation issues to mitigate risk.Ensure timely project completion through project scheduling, coordination, expediting of material deliveries and the management of material.Understand all trade contractors’ means and methods in accordance with project contract documents.Maintain a set of contract documents that contains all the current contract changes and clarifications.Develop and execute a plan for monitoring and completing punch-list items.Coordinate all required field inspections.Promote the growth and development of client, subcontractor, and vendor relationships.
Our Desirable Qualifications:Previous experience in commercial construction management with a General Contractor or related experienceKnowledge of construction management processes and means & methodsFamiliarity with various software including but not limited to Procore, Microsoft Project, Microsoft Office Suite, BlueBeam, etc.Self-motivatedExcellent organizational skillsExcellent time management skillsRelationship builderStrong negotiation skillsDeadline and detail-oriented﻿What we offer:401k401k matchingAuto allowanceCompany cell phoneBonus potentialPaid vacationPaid holidaysHealth & Dental Insurance for you and your familyFlexible spending account

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Construction Superintendent
output_json.summary: Seeking a Construction Superintendent for a commercial general contracting firm in Eden Prairie, MN.
job_responsibilities: Enforce project site logistics and safety programs
Maintain and enforce quality assurance and workmanship programs
Monitor and report job site activities
Review contract documents for potential conflicts
Understand trade contractors' means and methods
Develop and execute punch-list completion plan
Promote client, subcontractor, and vendor relationships
output_json.company_information: Steiner Construction is a commercial general contracting firm based in Eden Prairie, MN, with expertise in various commercial construction projects.
